ai-project-brief: Genderbase, an educational resource for understanding gender issues. Modern and clean design that emphasizes clarity and approachability. Features earthy tones with pops of color and clean sans-serif typography. Fully responsive design across all devices. IMPORTANT: All section background images will use creative means (dimmed background, text boxes, effects...) to ensure optimal text visibility and readability. Furthermore, the website's visual identity will exclusively use imagery related to gender diversity and inclusivity, including supportive environments, symbols of equality, and diverse community representation, ensuring a cohesive and authentic brand experience that fosters understanding and connection.
